property.name: public
property.formula: (SELECT count(*) > 0 FROM GALLERIES gallery, GALLERY_IMAGES gi WHERE gallery.public = 1 and gallery.GALLERY_ID = gi.GALLERY_ID and IMAGE_ID = gi.IMAGE_ID)

hibernate-mapping.query: select elements(descriptor.keywords) from ImageDescriptor descriptor where (:includePrivate = true or descriptor.public = true)
select count(*) from ImageDescriptor descriptor where :keyword in elements(descriptor.keywords) and (:includePrivate = true or descriptor.public = true)
from ImageDescriptor descriptor where :keyword in elements(descriptor.keywords) and (:includePrivate = true or descriptor.public = true) order by descriptor.id asc
select descriptor.id, descriptor.imageCreationDate from ImageDescriptor descriptor where descriptor.imageCreationDate.year is not null and (:includePrivate = true or descriptor.public = true)
select descriptor.id, descriptor.creationDate from ImageDescriptor descriptor where (:includePrivate = true or descriptor.public = true)

select count(*) from ImageDescriptor descriptor where descriptor.imageCreationDate.year = :year and (descriptor.imageCreationDate.month = :month or (descriptor.imageCreationDate.month is null and :month is null)) and (:includePrivate = true or descriptor.public = true)

from ImageDescriptor descriptor where descriptor.imageCreationDate.year = :year and (descriptor.imageCreationDate.month = :month or (descriptor.imageCreationDate.month is null and :month is null)) and (:includePrivate = true or descriptor.public = true) order by descriptor.imageCreationDate.month asc, descriptor.imageCreationDate.day asc, descriptor.id asc
select count(*) from ImageDescriptor descriptor where descriptor.imageCreationDate.year = :year and (:includePrivate = true or descriptor.public = true)

from ImageDescriptor descriptor where descriptor.imageCreationDate.year = :year and (:includePrivate = true or descriptor.public = true) order by descriptor.imageCreationDate.month asc, descriptor.imageCreationDate.day asc, descriptor.id asc
select count(*) from ImageDescriptor descriptor where descriptor.creationDate >= :startDate and descriptor.creationDate <= :endDate and (:includePrivate = true or descriptor.public = true)

from ImageDescriptor descriptor where descriptor.creationDate >= :startDate and descriptor.creationDate <= :endDate and (:includePrivate = true or descriptor.public = true) order by descriptor.creationDate asc, descriptor.id asc
